content:
During August Connectathon it was mentioned that, Payer has to make Patient account history available from Jan 1st 2016 for a members as long as they are continued to be covered by that payer, and after membership termination of coverage payer has to keep the data available for 5 more years.
Can you please clarify me following three scenarios?
1) What if that member obtain coverage with the same payer before end of 5 years (and Payer maintains same account internally)
2) Member is part of CHIP and he became adult and still covered by MEDICAID
3) Member moved from commercial to MEDICAID/MEDICARE (Due to financial or retirement) - Do we have to display commercial account also as part of the history!
Hi @venkat chirumamilla - Did you ever receive feedback on these questions? If so, can you share?
